Frequently Asked Questions

How do I create a workflow?

Visit the Workflow page to create and manage your automation workflows.

How do I upgrade my plan?

Go to Pricing and select your desired plan, or manage your subscription in the Customer Portal.

Where can I see my workflow runs?

Check your Dashboard for recent workflow execution history.
